r.s: A test runner for Test Driven Development
r.d: Stagehand_TestRunner provides a test runner to run unit tests. Stagehand_TestRunner strongly supports Test Driven Development by various features.
r.n:
This is the first stable release of Stagehand_TestRunner.
What's New in Stagehand_TestRunner 1.0.0
* PHPUnit 3 Support: Stagehand_TestRunner can now be used with PHPUnit 3. If you use PHPUnit 3, use the testrunner3 script for running tests.
See the following release notes for details.
Enhancements ============
- Added support for specifying a file name directly. (Stagehand_TestRunner) - Added support for PHPUnit 3.
